title: OS Notes
text:

title: 1  Readling List
text:
Operating Systems in Three Easy Piecees. Arpaci-Dusseau
Operating Systems - Principles and Practice. Dahlin
Operating Systems - Design and Implementation, The Minix Book. Tanenbaum
xv6: a Simple, Unix-like Teaching Operating System. Cox, Kaashoek, Morris

title: 1  Readling List
text:
1.2 Networks

Network Basics for Hackers. Occupytheweb
Internetworking with TCP/IP - Principles, Protocols, and Architecture. Comer
Internet Core Protocols - The Definitive Guide. Hall
Hands-on Networking - From Theory to Practice. Maria-luisa Merani
Linux Basics for Hackers - Getting Started with Networking, Scripting, and Security in Kali. OccupyTheWeb
